title: Fey Data Pipeline
description: OCaml-based data processing pipeline that validates JSON game data definitions, manages entity relationships, and generates type-safe C# code for Unity integration.

data.title: Fey Data Pipeline
data.description: OCaml-based data processing pipeline that validates JSON game data definitions, manages entity relationships, and generates type-safe C# code for Unity integration.

title: Fey Console
description: Modern web-based console for creating, editing, and managing game entities. Features entity-specific editors, multi-entity support, and comprehensive testing.

data.title: Fey Console
data.description: Modern web-based console for creating, editing, and managing game entities. Features entity-specific editors, multi-entity support, and comprehensive testing.

title: Voice Viewer
description: Professional audio visualizer for faceless content creators and developers. Features live microphone mode with real-time parameter tuning, multiple visualizers (waveform, spectrum, circular), and professional themes perfect for devlogs and tutorials.

data.title: Voice Viewer
data.description: Professional audio visualizer for faceless content creators and developers. Features live microphone mode with real-time parameter tuning, multiple visualizers (waveform, spectrum, circular), and professional themes perfect for devlogs and tutorials.

title: Whisper Transcriber
description: Audio transcription tool leveraging OpenAI's Whisper model for accurate speech-to-text conversion.

data.title: Whisper Transcriber
data.description: Audio transcription tool leveraging OpenAI's Whisper model for accurate speech-to-text conversion.

title: Fey Manim Animations
description: Mathematical animation system for creating devlog content and educational materials.

data.description: Mathematical animation system for creating devlog content and educational materials.

title: octoio.dev
description: This portfolio website built with Next.js 15 and TypeScript. Features an interactive terminal, fuzzy search, MDX blog system, and comprehensive project showcase. Built collaboratively with Claude.

data.title: octoio.dev
data.description: This portfolio website built with Next.js 15 and TypeScript. Features an interactive terminal, fuzzy search, MDX blog system, and comprehensive project showcase. Built collaboratively with Claude.

title: Building This Website: My AI-Powered Development Experience
description: How I built octoio.dev using Claude as my AI development partner, and why it feels like being a PM with the world's most efficient team.

data.title: Fey (f√¶ge) - My Online Coop Dungeon Crawler RPG Roguelite - Devlog #0
data.description:
üöÄ I'm leaping into the unknown! Welcome to my first devlog for Fey (f√¶ge), an online coop dungeon crawler RPG roguelite, from its ideation to its creation.

The devlogs for the game will be bite-sized to cover the different systems.
